text: This is a list of events in 1941 in animation. ==Events== ===Specific date unknown=== * Roberto Sgrilli creates the animated short Il Barone di Münchhausen.https://www.lambiek.net/artists/s/sgrilli_roberto.htm ==Films released== *1 January - Princess Iron Fan (China) *20 June - The Reluctant Dragon (United States) *23 October - Dumbo (United States) *5 December - Mr. Bug Goes to Town (United States) == References == ==See also== *List of anime by release date (1939–1945)
title: 1941 in animation
